mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactions (id, account_id, amount, type) VALUES (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{amount}, 'DEPOSIT')
INSERT INTO transactions (id, account_id, amount, type) VALUES (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{amount}, 'WITHDRAW')
INSERT INTO transactions (id, account_id, amount, type) VALUES (#{id}, #{accountId}, -#{amount}, 'TRANSFER_FROM')
INSERT INTO transactions (id, account_id, amount, type) VALUES (#{id}, #{accountId}, #{amount}, 'TRANSFER_TO')
